# formattingDictionary

**Instance Property**

The formatting dictionary for the rule editor.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var formattingDictionary: [String : String]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you assign a new the formatting dictionary to this property, it sets the current to formatting strings file name to `nil`.

## Working with Formatting

- **formattingStringsFilename**: The name of the rule editor’s strings file.

items.description: The name of the rule editor’s strings file.
